Package org.hibernate.id

Interface OptimizableGenerator

All Superinterfaces:
BeforeExecutionGenerator, Configurable, ExportableProducer, Generator, IdentifierGenerator, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
PersistentIdentifierGenerator
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderedSequenceGenerator, SequenceStyleGenerator, TableGenerator
public interface OptimizableGenerator extends IdentifierGenerator, ExportableProducer
Commonality between sequence-based and table-based generators

    • OPT_PARAM

      static final String OPT_PARAM
      Indicates the optimizer to use, either naming a Optimizer implementation class or naming a StandardOptimizerDescriptor by name. Takes precedence over INCREMENT_PARAM.
